text: Fox and His Friends (lit. Freedom's law of the jungle. Western classic My Darling Clementine was released as Faustrecht der Prärie in German), also known as Fist-Right of Freedom, is a 1975 German drama movie directed by Rainer Werner Fassbinder (who also stars) and also starring Karlheinz Böhm, Harry Baer, Adrian Hoven, Ulla Jacobsson, Christane Maybach, Kurt Raab, Walter Sedlmayr, Rudolf Lenz. == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:1975 drama movies Category:1975 LGBT movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies directed by Rainer Werner Fassbinder Category:LGBT drama movies Category:German LGBT movies Category:Movies set in Munich Category:German-language movies
title: Fox and His Friends
